title: 'Classy and Comfortable: Top brand never disappoint'
body: I recently purchased the Raymond Black Trouser, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed with its quality and fit. As someone who values both style and comfort, these trousers checked all the right boxes.  First and foremost, the quality of the fabric is exceptional. The Raymond brand is renowned for its craftsmanship, and this trouser lives up to the reputation. The fabric feels premium and durable, ensuring that it will withstand regular wear and maintain its sharp appearance.  In terms of fit, I couldn't be happier. The trouser fit as expected, thanks to its well-tailored design. The waistband sits comfortably and the cut is just right, providing a flattering silhouette. Whether standing or sitting, I felt at ease and confident in this trouser.  The classic black color adds to the versatility of the garment. It effortlessly pairs with various shirts and shoes, making it suitable for both formal and semi-formal occasions. Whether I needed a professional look for the office or a polished outfit for an event, this trouser delivered.  Additionally, the attention to detail is evident in the small features. The pockets are well-placed and spacious enough to hold essentials without bulging. The stitching is neat and precise, showcasing the meticulous craftsmanship that Raymond is known for.  Overall, I highly recommend the Raymond Black Trouser to anyone in search of a high-quality, well-fitting trousers. Its excellent fabric, comfortable fit, and timeless style make it a reliable wardrobe staple. Whether for business or social occasions, you can trust these trousers to elevate your style while ensuring utmost comfort throughout the day.

title: 'Not good'

title: 'Excellent febric but wrong size'
body: 'The quality of febric is outstanding. However the size they sent was incorrect; I ordered a 36 and received a 38. Also more importantly it is not slim formal trouser it is just a formal trouser. Due to that I had to visit nearby tailor shop to rectify the size which cost me around Rs. 100.'
